pageContent:
Madhu Krishna Ragella  
Atlanta, GA   
 (650) 483-4402 • madhuragella@outlook.com  
  
 
DevOps/Cloud Engineer  
Solutions-focused DevOps Engineer with 8+ years of extensive experience in production and Cloud 
environments.  
 
Cloud  engineer  with  a  diverse  background  of  IT  experience  in  DevOps,  build  and  release  management, 
continuous integration, continuous deployment, automation, and cloud management. Known for the ability 
to adapt to changing technologies, as experience working in all areas of Jenkins for setting up CI for new 
projects, build automation, and plugin management. A team player with comfort working both autonomously 
and in team settings. A creative thinking problem solver with a demonstrated track record of providing IT 
support  to  both  internal  and  external  clients,  identifying  root  cause  issues,  troubleshooting,  and 
implementing long lasting solutions.  
Infrastructure Development • Automation • Monitoring Tools • Linux Administraiton

implementing long lasting solutions.  
Infrastructure Development • Automation • Monitoring Tools • Linux Administraiton  
Windows Administration • Big Data • Machine Learning  
 
TECHNICAL PROFICIENCIES  
Git/GitHub, GitLab, Bash, Python, MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server, DynamoDB, MongoDB (Atlas), Ant, Maven, 
Jenkins, Nexus, Artifactory, Ansible, Terraform, Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Services, Kubernetes 
(including EKS and GKE).  
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
  
AWS/DevOps Engineer (February 2020  - Present)  Fortinet INC  
 100% Remote 
   
GitHub, Jenkins, AWS, GCP, AZURE, Docker, Kubernetes, ELK, Postgres, Apollo configuration, Terraform  
Participate in the development of data infrastructure and platform roadmaps. Build full lifecycle automation 
tools,   e.g.   build,   automate   testing,   provision, management,   monitoring,   orchestration   etc.   Build 
DevOps/Cloud automation tooling and services to improve developer experience and productivity. Lead the

DevOps/Cloud automation tooling and services to improve developer experience and productivity. Lead the 
analysis of technical requirements of applications to ensure systems provide required availability, latency, 
scalability  and  efficiency.  Build  and  Improve  CI/CD  pipelines  using  continuous  integration/continuous 
deployment tools Jenkins. Program in Unix shell scripting, python, go and similar programming languages.  
Key Achievements:  
§ Explored  different  approaches  of  deploying  Elasticsearch  and  deployed  on  prem  Elasticsearch 
cluster with installed custom plugins and configured it with logstash and Kibana.  
§ Automated the deployment of AWS resources using Terraform modules and Jenkins .  
§ Developed  python  scripts  to  get  the  Instances  count  and  Storage  usage  in  AWS,  GCP  and  Azure 
accounts, projects and subscriptions.  
§ Worked  collaboratively  with  software  engineers  to  deploy  and  operate  multiple  cloud  native 
products.

...Continued...  
  
 
Page Two  
§ Built  infrastructure  based  on  Kubernetes  to  improve  scalability,  service  reliability,  capacity  and 
performance.  
§ Investigated new automation frameworks/tools to support product growth.  
   
AWS/DevOps Engineer (January 2017 -  February 2020 ) Employers:  
TimeSquareIT INC Dec2016 to Sep 2019  
Platinum Resource Group Sep 2019 - February 2020   
End Client: Astrazeneca, CA  
   
GitHub, Jenkins, AWS, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, Sumologic, Wavefront, Bitbucket, Jira, Confluence  
Provides  expertise  in  the  build  deployment  automation  using  Jenkins,  AWS,  Kurbernetes,  and  internal 
configuration  management  tools.  Sets  up  servers  and  installs  required  plugins.  Leveraged  scripting 
knowledge to development automation and deployment scripts in bash and python. Gained knowledge of 
Amazon  web  services  (e.g.,  EC2,  s3  cloud  watch,  elastic  load  balancers,  (IAM),  RDS,  and  route  53).

Amazon  web  services  (e.g.,  EC2,  s3  cloud  watch,  elastic  load  balancers,  (IAM),  RDS,  and  route  53). 
Performed branching, tagging, and release activities on Version Control Tool GIT (GitHub). Created setting 
up alerts across environments and platforms.  
Key Achievements:  
§ Facilitated the deployment of microservices, including maven building, docker containerization, and 
deploying the container in kubernetes clusters as replication controllers or deployments.  
§ Created terraform  modules  to  manage  configurations,  applications,  and  to  automate  installation 
processes of AWS instances in POC.  
§ Streamlined  user  profiles,  creating  users,  roles,  and  groups  using  Identity  Access  Management, 
ensuring compliance with required policies.  
§ Supported  the  integration  of  third  party  vendors  with  slack  in  monitoring  applications  and  logs, 
improving efficiency of workflows.

ensuring compliance with required policies.

evaluating requirements and components, and providing recommendations to finalize the product 
deployment platform.  
§ Established  collaborative  relationships  with  cross-functional  teams  to  expedite  the  debugging  of 
software and resolution of system problems.  
   
AWS Cloud Engineer (Sept 2014 - December 2016)  Analytics Data INC, New York, NY  
AWS (EC2, VPS, ELB, S3, RDS, Cloud Trail and Route 53), VPC, IAM, SQL, no SQL, ELB, Cloud watch, Cloud 
Formation, Jira, AS CLI, AWS Auto Scaling, Unix/Linus, Shell scripting  
Responsible  for  providing  development  support  in  AWS  cloud  environments.  Configured  elastic  load

Formation, Jira, AS CLI, AWS Auto Scaling, Unix/Linus, Shell scripting  
Responsible  for  providing  development  support  in  AWS  cloud  environments.  Configured  elastic  load 
balancers with EC2 auto scaling groups. Leveraged information management principles and experience in 
S3  versioning  to  manage  lifecycle  policies,  backup  and  archive  files.  Created  monitors,  alarms,  and 
notifications for EC2 hosts using CloudWatch.  
Key Achievements:  
§ Spearheaded the integration of AWS CloudWatch with AWS EC2 instances for monitoring, storing, 
and tracking metrics of log files.  
§ Established AWS S3 buckets, including folder management, and the management of cloud trail logs 
and objects within each bucket.  
§ Created highly available environments using auto-scaling, load balancers, and SQS.

...Continued...  
  
 
Page Three  
§ Improved login authentication and security by configuring AWS Identity Access Management Group 
and users, as well as crating security groups and configuring inbound/outbound rules.  
  
RHEL, Solaris, AIX, Windows, ShelliPlanet 4.1, Python, BMC Remedy, SunOne 6.1, IIS 6.0, Windows 2008, Linux, 
Shell Scripting, Oracle 9i. 
Provided on-call, 24/7 support for troubleshooting production issues, ensuring no downtime and no break in 
service.  Responsible  for  the  set  up  and  configuring  of  Linux  (RedHar  and  SUSE)  and  Solaris  servers  and 
workstations for clients. Configured NFS and FTP/NTP/NIS servers, setting up servers in network environments 
for  cross-functional  teams and  clients.  Performed  daily  build  ops  in  an  automated  and  continuous  process. 
Performed MS SQL upgrades on Windows servers. Compiled code to transition into test environments visa na

Performed MS SQL upgrades on Windows servers. Compiled code to transition into test environments visa na 
automated process. Logged all events to log files. Performed patches and database upgrades on servers. 
Key Achievements: 
§ Creatively addressed complex issues, troubleshooting software and hardware ranging from system 
resources to application stack races, to identify root cause issues and implement long lasting solutions. 
§ Established an efficient process of change requests, work orders, and problem tickets using BMC 
Remedy tool, requiring approvals from higher officials to ensure compliance with organizational 
policies. 
§ Championed the improvement of speed, efficiency, and scalability of the continuous integration 
environment. 
§ Effectively managed various competing projects, balancing priorities across system integration 
projects.
